Name: Port of Spain
Description: The capital region, known for its vibrant cultural scene, bustling markets, and historical architecture.

Name: San Fernando
Description: A key region in southern Trinidad, known for its industrial importance and lively waterfront areas.

Name: Tobago
Description: An island region known for its tropical beaches, diving sites, and rich natural beauty.

Name: Central Trinidad
Description: A region with a mix of agricultural and industrial areas, featuring the town of Chaguanas.

Name: North Eastern Trinidad
Description: A region known for its natural landscapes, including beaches and mountain ranges.
